definition: airport (abbr. for 航空港[hang2 kong1 gang3])
Hong Kong, abbr. for 香港[Xiang1 gang3]/surname Gang

sentences.english: He was required to carry in his head a detailed map of the airport.
sentences.chinese: 他的头脑里必须有一幅空港的详图。

sentences.english: Heath the Luo airport is one of world biggest air harbors.
sentences.chinese: 希思罗机场是世界最大的航空港之一。

sentences.english: Beijing airport vip service company ltd.
sentences.chinese: 北京空港贵宾服务有限公司。

sentences.english: Moore Park, Obi Island, time and space in Hong Kong, the underwater world, that good?
sentences.chinese: 摩尔庄园，奥比岛，时空港，海底世界，那个好？

sentences.english: The red phone was to the airport's duty fire chief .
sentences.chinese: 那个红色电话是打给空港火警值班主任的。

sentences.english: It is urgent to strengthen the cooperation of aviation port industry in Pan Pearl River Delta(PPRD).
sentences.chinese: 加强泛珠三角区域航空港合作是一个比较紧迫的问题。

sentences.english: Worthless cars abandoned on parking lots were currently a plague at every big city airport.
sentences.chinese: 丢在停车场的废旧汽车如今成了城市空港的一个祸害。

sentences.english: "Provide quality services for customers" is the tenet of the Airport Industrial Zone.
sentences.chinese: “为客商提供优质服务”是空港工业区的工作宗旨。

sentences.english: Anyone who’s traveled knows that sometimes there are airport taxes.
sentences.chinese: 旅行的人往往知道，有时还有航空港税。

sentences.english: The newly-built airport has the most advanced facilities, and provides perfect service.
sentences.chinese: 新落成的航空港有着最先进的设施和最完备的服务。

sentences.english: Ningbo Lishe International Airport will become an international airport and cargo distribution center.
sentences.chinese: 宁波栎社国际机场将建成国际性空港和货运集散中心。

definition: Xingang or Hsinkang township in Chiayi county 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 xian4], west Taiwan
Xincheng or Hsincheng township in Hualien County 花蓮縣|花莲县[Hua1 lian2 Xian4], east Taiwan
Dagang former district of Tianjin, now part of Binhai subprovincial district 濱海新區|滨海新区[Bin1 hai3 xin1 qu1]
a port for external trade/a trading or transit post on border between countries
